strings: <voice_0x0100098B><se_low>Kalderasha: I knew you would return before long.
<voice_0x0100098C><se_low>Kalderasha: And it seems you have done as Valentina asked.
<voice_0x0100098D><se_low>Kalderasha: You see! Even with a glass ball, the Great Kalderasha's eyes see further than you realise!
<voice_0x0100098E><se_low>Kalderasha: But you are meddling in matters that do not concern you.

<voice_0x0100098F><se_low>Kalderasha: And you are wasting your time. You can bring back my crystal ball as many times as you like.
I will just throw it away again!

<voice_0x01000990><se_low>Kalderasha: What!? Don't throw things in the waterfall?
It might open up an old wound? 
What on earth are you talking about?

<voice_0x01000991><se_low>Kalderasha: Enough! Listen to me!
No one knows why I threw away my crystal ball.

<voice_0x01000992><se_low>Kalderasha: Even Valentina has no idea.
I'm not about to confide in a stranger.

<voice_0x01000993><se_low>Kalderasha: Give it to me!
This time I will smash it into a million pieces,
so it never finds its way back to me again!
<voice_0x01000994><se_high><se_high>Valentina: Stop! Please stop, Father!
<voice_0x01000995><se_high>Valentina: I know! I've known for ages...
<voice_0x01000996><se_high>Valentina: I know why you threw away your crystal ball.

<voice_0x01000997><se_low>Kalderasha: You, you know...!?
So you know about your real parents?
<voice_0x01000998><se_high>Valentina: Yes. And I don't blame you for their death.
<voice_0x01000999><se_low>Kalderasha: Why not? How can you not blame me, Valentina? How can you not hate me?

<voice_0x0100099A><se_high>Valentina: Because you were just fortune-telling.
Just doing what you do best.
<voice_0x0100099B><se_high>Valentina: I was too young to remember, but...you were once a truly great fortune-teller, weren't you, Father?

<voice_0x0100099C><se_high>Valentina: No one knew where my parents had fled to.
But to you, it was as clear as day.
<voice_0x0100099D>Kalderasha: ............

<voice_0x010009A1><se_low>Kalderasha: I thought only of myself. Be they good or bad,
I cared not who asked me to use my crystal ball.
I lived for the vision!
<voice_0x010009A2><se_high>Valentina: It's all right, Father.
<voice_0x010009A3><se_high>Valentina: You're a good man. You took me in and raised me, didn't you? When I was just a helpless baby.
<voice_0x010009A4><se_high>Valentina: I want to see it for myself.
<voice_0x010009A5><se_high>Valentina: I want to see the Great Kalderasha in all his glory! I want to see your magnificent powers at work again, Father.
<voice_0x010009A6><se_low>Kalderasha: Oh, my sweet Valentina...

<voice_0x010009A7><se_low>Kalderasha: So you are awake at last!
It is already past midday.
You must have been exhausted.
<voice_0x010009A8><se_low>Kalderasha: I must thank you and your friend.

<voice_0x010009A9><se_low>Kalderasha: Look!
I have put my crystal ball back where it belongs.
<voice_0x010009AA><se_low>Kalderasha: Many years have passed since I gazed into the crystal like this... I have to thank you for returning it to me.
<voice_0x010009AB><se_low>Kalderasha: W-What is this!?
<voice_0x010009AC><se_low>Kalderasha: Yes, yes! I see it! I see it! There is a jester! A jester breaking through the southern checkpoint!
<voice_0x010009AD><se_low>Kalderasha: Yes! The mists are clearing!
<voice_0x010009AE><se_low>Kalderasha: And the same jester murdered Master Rylus!
<voice_0x010009AF><se_low>Kalderasha: Yes! Yeeesss! The mists are clearing!

<voice_0x010009B0><se_low>Kalderasha: Ah!? Can it be...? Surely not...
He has changed, but there can be no mistake.
It has to be Master Rylus's former pupil...
<voice_0x010009B1><se_low>Kalderasha: Dhoulmagus!
<voice_0x010009B2><se_low>Yangus: Huh? Wot!?
<voice_0x010009B3><se_low>Yangus: Guv! He said Dhoulmagus, right? That's our man! That's the evil magician you an' the old grandad are after, innit?

<voice_0x010009B4><se_low>Yangus: So where'd 'e go after that?
Wot else can yer deduct?
<voice_0x010009B5><se_low>Kalderasha: What else...? Let me look deeper.
<voice_0x010009B6><se_low>Kalderasha: Hm? What's this...?
<voice_0x010009B7><se_low>Kalderasha: Yes, no question. This is definitely my old crystal ball. But, look here! It has been chipped.
<voice_0x010009B8><se_low>Kalderasha: Hm! It must have hit something very hard to do this damage.
<voice_0x010009B9><se_low>Kalderasha: And look! Someone has scratched some letters next to the chip...

<voice_0x010009BA><se_low>Kalderasha: What!? Halfwit!? Who's the halfwit!?
What ignorant lowlife would do this to my crystal ball?

<voice_0x010009BB><se_low>Yangus: You wot!? When I asked wot else yer could see,
I didn't mean ON the ball, I meant IN the ball!
<voice_0x010009BC><se_low>Yangus: Wotever! Oh, come on, guv!
<voice_0x010009BD><se_low>Yangus: Hang on a minute! Wait!
<voice_0x0100099E><se_low>Kalderasha: Back then, there was nothing I could not see.
<voice_0x0100099F><se_low>Kalderasha: The Great Kalderasha was known all over the world. I was walking on air.

<voice_0x010009A0><se_low>Kalderasha: Fortune-telling was my life.
It was my soul.
